gameticket_package

Class Ticket

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameticket_package.Ticket

  • public class Ticket
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the ticket data, Single-responsibility principle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ticket(Game game, Seat seat)
      Creates a ticket for a fan holding the game and seat he reserved

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ticket

        public Ticket(Game game,
              Seat seat)
        Creates a ticket for a fan holding the game and seat he reserved
        Parameters:
        game - the game the ticket is reserved for
        seat - the seat the fan reserved in the game

    • Method Detail

      • upgradeTicket

        public void upgradeTicket(Seat seat)
        Upgrades the ticket seat to a new seat of higher category
        Parameters:
        seat - the new seat the fan upgraded to

      • checkTicketDate

        public boolean checkTicketDate()
        Checks the ticket date to tell if user can or cannot return his ticket
        Returns:
        true if he asks to return the ticket 3 days before the match day
        See Also:
        Date Class

      • displayTicketData

        public void displayTicketData()
        displays ticket data

      • chooseTicket

        public static Ticket chooseTicket(java.util.ArrayList<Ticket> tickets)
                           throws invalidChoiceException
        Static Function Allows choosing a ticket if exists according to a the code the fan enters
        Parameters:
        tickets - the whole tickets of the fan to choose from
        Returns:
        the ticket the user choose
        Throws:
        invalidChoiceException - if ticket code entered by fan doesn't exist in his tickets

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()
        Returns:
        the game of the ticket

      • getSeat

        public Seat getSeat()
        Returns:
        the seat of the ticket

        Returns:
